mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CoInfoBoard (co_email, co_title, content) VALUES (#{co_email}, #{co_title}, #{content})
INSERT INTO CoCommentOfInfoBoard (co_email, co_infoId, content) VALUES (#{co_email}, #{co_infoId}, #{content})
INSERT INTO CoReCommentOfInfoBoard (co_email, co_coib, content) VALUES (#{co_email}, #{co_coib}, #{content})
mapper.select: select distinct cib.co_infoId as 'co_infoId', cib.co_email as 'co_email', cu.profileImg as 'profileImg', cib.co_title as 'co_title', substr(cib.content, 1, 40) as 'content', cib.co_mainImg as 'co_mainImg', (select count(*) from CoLikeOfInfoBoard cloib where cloib.co_infoId = cib.co_infoId) as 'co_likeCount', (select (select count(*) from CoCommentOfInfoBoard ccoib2 where ccoib2.co_infoId = cib.co_infoId) + (select count(*) from CoReCommentOfInfoBoard crcoib where crcoib.co_coib = ccoib.co_coib)) as 'co_commentCount', (select count(*) from CoMarkOfInfoBoard cmoib where cmoib.co_infoId = cib.co_infoId) as 'co_markCount', cib.createdAt as 'createAt', cib.updatedAt as 'updateAt' from CoInfoBoard cib left join CoUser cu on cib.co_email = cu.co_email left join CoCommentOfInfoBoard ccoib on cib.co_infoId = ccoib.co_infoId
SELECT co_moib FROM CoMarkOfInfoBoard WHERE co_email=#{co_email} AND co_infoId=#{co_infoId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CoMarkOfInfoBoard WHERE co_email =#{co_email} AND co_infoId = #{co_infoId}
